name: Nice Guys
content: Talker telling her good looking lies
有人说着她擅长的谎言
She hates but she loves it
She hates but she loves it
She hates but he loves it
She hates but he loves it
他会吞下你 嚼得稀烂
You take it cause you want it
你接受了因为你也想要这样
She don't won't the nice guy
她不会看上这个好男人
She don't want the right guy
She wants the one night good time
她想要一个一见倾心的人
当你遇到一个好男人你应该有礼貌
你想跳进每个坏男人的怀里
人善被人欺 人善被人欺
She's sweet as pie  she knows
她甜如馅饼 她知道

He hates that he loves her

She don't won't the nice guy
